revised_title: Three-Dimensional Wave-Packet Evolution in Surface Waves
tldr: The authors use the method of multiple scales to derive two coupled nonlinear partial differential equations that describe the evolution of a three-dimensional wave-packet on water of finite depth. They study the stability of uniform Stokes wavetrain to small disturbances with a length scale large compared to the wavelength. The stability criterion obtained is identical to that derived by Hayes under more restrictive conditions.
